attributes.action: Increase the age limit to 21 to be able to drive  and do more to prevent road deaths
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I personally think that the age to drive a car should be increased dramatically to cut road deaths. This will cut the numbers of cars on the road and help the environment too! I also feel the government is not doing enough to tackle the increasing number of deaths on our roads.
If you feel the same way, sign this petition!
